item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I have been working in IT for several years now and have worked in many different roles, most recently spending most of my time working on AWS. The aim of this blog is to provide information, tutorials and guidance on cloud computing, IT, and tech in general. Please feel free to contact me via social media if you have anything you would like to discuss. ðŸ“œ certifications AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional
